name: indexchat
description: Local RAG system for PDF documents

scripts.dev: concurrently -n watcher,server,ui -c blue,green,magenta "npm run watcher" "npm run server" "npm run ui"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../ui && npm install
scripts.install:python: cd indexer && python3 -m venv venv && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
